Description: Optimization of a linear objective function subject to linear equality and inequality constraints.
Optimization where some or all variables are restricted to be integers.
Optimization of a nonlinear objective function subject to nonlinear constraints.
Optimization of a quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints.
Optimization where some variables are continuous and others are integers.
Optimization where the objective function and constraints are convex.
Optimization under uncertainty with probabilistic constraints.
Optimization by breaking the problem into simpler subproblems.
